languages.text: "Я хотела исполнить то, что должны были сделать вы как правопреемни{mf|к|ца} Теодоры — защитить священную десятину. Не стоит придавать моему понятному желанию компрометирующую окраску".
"I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."
languages.original_text: "Я хотела исполнить то, что должны были сделать вы как правопреемни{mf|к|ца} Теодоры — защитить священную десятину. Не стоит придавать моему понятному желанию компрометирующую окраску".

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in presenting my reasonable desire in a damning light."
"I wanted to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in presenting my reasonable desire in a damning light."
"I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."
"I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."
"I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."
"I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."

languages.text: "Ich wollte lediglich tun, was Theodoras {mf|Nachfolger|Nachfolgerin} tun sollte ... den heiligen Zehnt beschützen. Es ergibt keinen Sinn, meinen verständlichen Wunsch in ein schlechtes Licht zu rücken."
languages.original_text: "I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte lediglich tun, was Theodoras {mf|Nachfolger|Nachfolgerin} tun sollte ... den heiligen Zehnt beschützen. Es ergibt keinen Sinn, meinen verständlichen Wunsch in ein schlechtes Licht zu rücken."

languages.text: « Je voulais simplement protéger la dîme sacrée, comme aurait dû le faire l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de Théodora. Inutile d'essayer de présenter ce désir parfaitement raisonnable sous un jour condamnable. »
languages.original_text: "I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."

traits.locale_text: « Je voulais simplement protéger la dîme sacrée, comme aurait dû le faire l'{mf|héritier|héritière} de Théodora. Inutile d'essayer de présenter ce désir parfaitement raisonnable sous un jour condamnable. »

languages.text: “那个时候，我只是想守护神圣的什一税，这是西奥多拉的继承人该做的事情。你打算把我的合理动机污名化，但这种行为毫无意义。”
languages.original_text: "I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."

traits.locale_text: “那个时候，我只是想守护神圣的什一税，这是西奥多拉的继承人该做的事情。你打算把我的合理动机污名化，但这种行为毫无意义。”

languages.text: «Solo quería que hiciera lo que debía hacer como sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora: proteger el sagrado diezmo. No hay razón para presentar un deseo bien razonable de forma tan condenatoria».
languages.original_text: "I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."

traits.locale_text: «Solo quería que hiciera lo que debía hacer como sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora: proteger el sagrado diezmo. No hay razón para presentar un deseo bien razonable de forma tan condenatoria».

languages.text: 「私はただ、あなたがシオドーラの後継者として聖なる租税を守ることを望んでいただけです。私の合理的な願いを、あえて罪深く見せようとするのは無意味です」
languages.original_text: "I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."

traits.locale_text: 「私はただ、あなたがシオドーラの後継者として聖なる租税を守ることを望んでいただけです。私の合理的な願いを、あえて罪深く見せようとするのは無意味です」

languages.text: "Ben yalnızca Theodora'nın halefi olarak sizin sorumluluğunuzu üstlenmek, kutsal aşarı korumak istedim. Makul arzumu kınayıcı bir tavırla ifade etmeye çalışmanın anlamı yok."
languages.original_text: "I simply wished to do what you as Theodora's successor were supposed to do — protect the sacred tithe. There is no point in trying to present my reasonable desire in a damning light."

traits.locale_text: "Ben yalnızca Theodora'nın halefi olarak sizin sorumluluğunuzu üstlenmek istedim. Kutsal aşarı korumak. Makul arzumu kınayıcı bir tavırla ifade etmeye çalışmanın anlamı yok."
